mapper.sql: id, code, pcode, name, icon, url, num, levels,pcodes, tips, status,isopen,ismenu
mapper.select:
select
from sys_menu where status = 1
and (name like CONCAT('%',#{condition},'%') or code like CONCAT('%',#{condition},'%'))
and levels = #{level}
order by levels asc,num asc

SELECT m1.id ,m1.name as name,m1.code, (CASE WHEN (m2.id = 0 OR m2.id IS NULL) THEN 0 ELSE m2.id END ) as pid, (CASE WHEN (m2.id = 0 OR m2.id IS NULL) THEN 'true' ELSE 'false' END ) as open FROM sys_menu m1 LEFT join sys_menu m2 ON m2.status = 1 and m1.pcode = m2.code WHERE m1.status = 1 order by m1.levels, m1.num
select url from sys_relation rel inner join sys_menu m on rel.menuid = m.id and m.status=1 where rel.roleid = #{roleId}

select
from sys_menu where pcodes like CONCAT('%[',#{pcodes},']%')
select count(*) from sys_menu where code = #{code}
select name from sys_menu where id in (#{menuids})
